verbose_text: Although their roles in Fe (III) oxide reduction and their relationship with Shewanella nanowires and the outer-membrane vesicles are currently uncharacterized, it is proposed that EPS associated MtrC, OmcA, and probably MtrB may be part of non local electron transfer strategy used by S. oneidensis MR-1 for reduction of the Fe (III) oxide minerals distant from the bacterial cell surface.
evidence: MR-1 for reduction of the Fe(III)
